<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Swordkeeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1330)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Collectors who want to guard their magical arsenals procure or build swordkeepers. These constructs are equal parts display case and security system, each holding a single weapon within its body and projecting copies of the weapon it stores to deter would-be thieves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Swordkeeper.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Swordkeeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1330)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 261</row>

**Perception** +20

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Central Weapon** A swordkeeper's torso houses a single weapon of a level no higher than the swordkeeper. While the swordkeeper is operational, the chamber requires four successful DC 32 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=69) to open; on a critical failure, the backlash deals 6d6 force damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save) to the creature attempting the check. If the swordkeeper is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), or [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36), both DCs are reduced by 2. If the weapon is removed, the swordkeeper's echoblades vanish.

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 (31 with guard raised)

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +19 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 285

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
echoblade +23 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 slashing plus 1d8 force

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
echoblade +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 slashing plus 1d8 force

**Echoblade Flurry** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The swordkeeper makes two melee echoblade Strikes. If both Strikes hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weakness. Apply the swordkeeper's multiple attack penalty normally.

**Project Echoblade** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Requirements** The swordkeeper has a central weapon; **Effect** The swordkeeper projects an echoblade—a force copy of its central weapon that deals 1d8 additional force damage and gains [thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195). Echoblades inherit the weapon damage dice, weapon traits, and runes of the central weapon, but no other abilities or activations. The swordkeeper gains access to their [critical specialization](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) effects. The swordkeeper can have up to four echoblades at once; unattended echoblades vanish at the end of the swordkeeper's turn.

**Colossal Echo** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75)) **Requirements** The swordkeeper has a central weapon; **Effect** The swordkeeper projects a massive echoblade held in all four hands, dealing 9d8 force damage to all creatures in a 30-foot line (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Colossal Echo again for 1d4 rounds.

**Raise Guard** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Effect** The swordkeeper raises an echoblade to protect itself, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of its next turn.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Treasure Guardians</title>

While the sample swordkeeper awards treasure based on its level, you can use a swordkeeper to provide PCs with a powerful or significant weapon—particularly an [artifact](/equipment/artifacts) or [relic](/equipment/relics). To create a swordkeeper with a different weapon, replace the [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait from its echoblade Strikes with those of the new weapon, change the weapon damage dice to match, and apply any runes. Unless you want to significantly change the swordkeeper's level, you should also adjust the Strike damage to make sure it's not too high or too low.
</aside>
